SettingsItem.Name: Specify the Bod approach
SettingsItem.Description: Specify the approach used for estimating the attributable burden of disease.

SettingsItem.Name: Specify the exposure grouping method
SettingsItem.Description: Specify the method by which the exposures are grouped in bins. For 'Custom bins', the specified bins are used for all exposure response functions. For 'ERF-defined bins', the bins defined for subgroups are used and for exposure response functions without subgroups, the specified custom bins are used.

SettingsItem.Name: Specify the bin boundaries.
SettingsItem.Description: Specify the boundaries (%) of the bins by which the exposures are grouped. For 'Custom bins', the specified bins are used for all exposure response functions. For 'ERF-defined bins', the bins defined for subgroups are used and for exposure response functions without subgroups, the specified custom bins are used. Boundaries should be greater than 0 and smaller than 100%.
